title: Perma Banned
body: So I got permanently banned. I feel that I could change my attitude and become a better player. Is there a way I could vouch for a chance to get my account back as a better person?

replies.body: It's tough to get an account back if it's been suspended for behavioral reasons, but we're not oppose to making a new account if you like.  You can also hit up our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like to dispute the suspension.
